title: 45. Caring for Overlooked Areas of Skin - Dark circles, Tech Neck, Bacne, and Decollete
description:
Hi Roomies! In this episode we are back with Michele Phelan to discuss areas of the skin that are often overlooked/not cared for as intensely as the skin on our face. We are discussing the eye area and breakouts/wrinkles on the neck, back, and décolleté.

Find Michele and her courses at www.conceptsinstitute.com

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
